// 扶뒬못 import React from 'react' import './search.less' const index = () => { const [btnshow, setBtnshow] = React.useState(false); const [seltext, setSeltext] = React.useState('All Filters'); const [iputvalue, setIputvalue] = React.useState(''); const setShow = (e, a) => { console.log(e,a) e.nativeEvent.stopImmediatePropagation() e.stopPropagation() setBtnshow(a) } const setSetexts = (a) => { setSeltext(a) setBtnshow(false) } const onInputvalue = ({ target }) => { setIputvalue(target.value) } const onSubmit = () => { console.log(seltext, iputvalue) } return (
setShow(e, false)} >

Fusion Blockchain Explorer

setSetexts('All Filters')}>All Filters
setSetexts('Asset')}>Asset
setSetexts('Address')}>Address
setSetexts('Transactions')}>Transactions
onInputvalue(e)} value={iputvalue} />
) } export default index
